As you whisper to your pusaka, it attempts to cut away an enemy's shadow, leaving them in an eternal sleep. Your pusaka gains the following Activation.

Activateâ€”Cut the Shadow 2 (concentrate, manipulate, mental)

Frequency once per day

Effect Your pusaka becomes a kris made of darkness and drives itself into an adjacent enemy's shadow. That enemy takes @Damage[80[mental]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save against your spell DC or class DC, whichever is higher. If this reduces the creature to 0 Hit Points, the target doesn't die, but its shadow is severed from its body, becoming a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-monster-core.Actor.Shadow Spawn] that attempts to flee from the target's body. As long as the shadow spawn exists, the target remains in a dreamless slumber; if destroyed, the target regains its shadow and awakens (if its body was kept properly while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious]).
